name: Bombtastic
description:
First playable demo on the Bomberman inspired game I'm working on.

Two player local multiplayer game. The goal is to remain the last one alive.

Controls: 

Player 1 - Demon: WASD to move and E to place down bombs

Player 2 - Angel : Arrow Keys to move and Spacebar to place down bombs

There's powerups for movement speed, explosion range and number of bombs you can place, found in crates.

Work in progress.

I'm open to your feedback.

The development journey is documented on my Youtube Channel:

https://www.youtube.com/c/MoonLightGames
